flash.stm32.core

Class DeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • flash.stm32.core.DeviceManager

  • public final class DeviceManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Entry point to the progstm32 sdk. Application must obtain an instance of this class and call methods in it.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DeviceManager.IFace
      Pre-defined communication interface for communication between bootloader and host computer.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommunicationIface

        public CommunicationInterface getCommunicationIface(DeviceManager.IFace iface,
                                                    java.lang.String libName)
                                             throws java.io.IOException

        Gives an instance of UARTInterface which represents serial port of host.

        Parameters:
        iface - set it to IFace.UART
        libName - unique name for shared library
        Returns:
        an instance of UARTInterface
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if SerialPundit library can not be initialized

      • isFileInHexFormat

        public boolean isFileInHexFormat(java.io.File file)
                          throws java.io.IOException

        Try to parse and check if the given file is in intel hex format or not.

        Parameters:
        file - file which needs to be verified
        Returns:
        true if file is in intel hex format otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if given file not found or unable to read it

      • getSDKVersion

        public java.lang.String getSDKVersion()

        Gives version of the prog32 SDK.

        Returns:
        version of the prog32 SDK
